1. Interactive video tutorial: Create an interactive video tutorial that guides users through the process of setting up and using end-to-end encrypted messaging. The video can include visual aids and real-life examples to make the process as simple and understandable as possible.
2. Infographic: Create an infographic that explains the benefits of using end-to-end encryption and how it works in a simple and easy-to-understand way.
3. User manual: Develop a user manual that includes step-by-step instructions for setting up and using end-to-end encrypted messaging. The manual can be written in plain language, with visual aids and real-life examples.
4. Virtual workshop: Host virtual workshops for low-tech users to educate them about end-to-end encrypted messaging. The workshops can include interactive activities and Q&A sessions to help participants understand the concept and its benefits.
5. Testimonials: Gather testimonials from users who have already adopted end-to-end encryption and share their experiences with others. This can help to build trust and increase awareness of the benefits of the technology.
